name: Attack Of The Waffle Clones
description:
Endless Runner game made for: Games Factory Jam & Weekly Game Jam

Your evil waffle clone experiment has gone out of control, collect power supplies for points and avoid the evil waffle clones.

MAIN THEME: Waffle

Secondary Theme: Power Supply

Tertiary Theme: Clones

Constraint: Maximum Three Colors

Controls:

Space to jump, Double Tap to double jump.
